page.title: 10Employment in Pembrey (1)
page.content: These are the results of a survey we carried out to find the type of employment in our area. The sample we took was of{fathers}of children in the junior section of Pembrey C.P. school. {75% work outside the village { 5% work in the village {20% are unemployed From our survey we found that some fathers travel hundreds of miles to find a job e.g. Saudi Arabia. Others have jobs in Burry Port, Llanelli or Swansea. Most travel to work by car, others by motor-bike or vans and some by bus. Jobs vary greatly. These are some of the jobs: Printer Surveyor Policeman Welder Mechanic Electrician Salesman Publican Bank manager Clerk Singer Chimney sweep Cobbler Painter Factory worker Miner Builder Lorry driver
